string-array.name: competition_instructions_how_to_compete_details
string-array.item: "When a competition begins, the 'PARTICIPATE' button will go live. Click here to begin."
"Details of the current event will be shown on a new page. Participants eligible for the event can initiate by clicking the 'START' button."
"You are now competing. A scramble will be presented to you, upon execution of which you can begin inspection followed by the solve itself."
"Repeat this process for all the solves in a round. Your results will automatically be submitted.
"After each solve, you will get an option to add '+2's or 'DNF' the solve. You must complete all solves before the round ends, else all your solves will be disqualified."
"If you expect to podium in any event, make sure you record your solves. You can then submit them for verification."

string-array.name: competition_instructions_podium_details
string-array.item: "Any competitor expecting a podium must record his solves in the final round for that event."
"Videos concerned must contain an original uncut footage that starts when the user clicks on 'START'."
"The organizers may directly contact a competitor for verification purposes."
"Videos concerned can be uploaded on YouTube/Drive/Link provided by the organizer."
